metadata.description:
From the First Censorship Area Detachment - Information for Loyalty Checks (Tacloban, October 28, 1944)

1. From: Barusog Cebedo of Dulag, Leyte; To: Mrs. Bebiana J. Cebedo c/o Mr. Angel Serrano of 1007 Velasquez? Tondo, Manila (Dated September 4, 1944)
Comment: Friend of Japanese Officer

2. From: B. Pambuan c/o Francisco Selano of Pantaleon St., Palo, Leyte; To: Mr. Benjamin Pambuan of Sta. Cruz, Laguna (Dated August 20, 1944)
Comment: Filipino employed by Japanese Intelligence
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Military; information; restricted
metadata.title: Information for Loyalty Checks - Tacloban Leyte, October 28, 1944
